Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: jeph001
Reviews.Content: The hotel is nice looking and, although it is far from any of the attractions that Barcelona has to offer, it is quite close to the Metro Two of us stayed in the hotel for 3 nights. The pluses: I thought the bed was comfortable, the room was relatively spacious and modern, and they do provide instant coffee/tea at no additional charge. The room also has a microwave. The minuses are a bit more numerous. There is a mini bar but the prices are high. No mugs for coffee, only styrofoam cups which have a tendency to rupture when you microwave water to make coffee. The room we stayed in had no bath tub, nor did the bathroom have washcloths, only towels and a bathmat. The soap in the shower is a combo shampoo and body soap. The design of the shower is a little peculiar: there is a glass partition that runs about half the length of the shower but the other half is open, hence the floor in the bathroom does get wet when you use the shower. The air conditioning system never really got the room cold enough for my liking. The last thing I want to talk about was their housekeeping and front desk service. After our first night, housekeeping cleaned the room but didn't refill the coffee/tea. We called the front desk and housekeeping did rectify the situation. The 2nd day of our stay, we were out and about in Barcelona the whole day. When we returned, we sadly discovered that housekeeping did not clean the room. When we complained to the front desk, no apologies. They did ask if we left the 'do not disturb' light on. We advised that we did not and the front desk basically said there was nothing they could do since it was late in the evening. We requested new towels and they brought us 2 after about 1/2 hour. Based on the price paid, the hotel didn't live up to the reviews that I read and I really expected more.

Reviews.Title: “Good but could be better”
Reviews.Author: GV5_UK
Reviews.Content: I booked a triple room for myself, wife and 6 year old son for a long weekend. The location was exactly what I was expecting, walking distance to a decent beach but out of town away from the noise. There is a tram stop right outside which will take you into town for 2 Euro's and is only 10 mins. It's a 20 minute taxi ride to the airport, around 35-40 Euros. We were on the 2nd floor above reception and on Saturday night could hear the music from the bar downstairs which was dissapointing. Also we must have had the main waste water pipe next to our room as we constantly had water noise gushing through a pipe near our room entrance. I think we were probably unlucky with our room and it's not common but it tainted my experience. I also found the bed too hard and woke in the morning with back ache, not that I slept much anyway due to the music and gushing sounds! The hotel also let themselves down by visible cost saving excersies such as soap dispensers in the bathroom instead of toiletries and the strict dont touch anything in the minibar or on the shelves or you will be charged policy, which makes it feel a little tacky. The hotel was very clean and the staff were excellent, the pool area is nice but dissapointed it was not heated - I was unable to take my son in as it was too cold although it was a nice sunny April day. The breakfast at 15 Euros I felt was quite good value for money - excellent choice and plenty there, although it could get quite busy. Bathroom was nice too, but a shame we had no bath only a shower - it was a good shower though! This is a very functional hotel and if you get a good room I can see you can give it higher rating. The staff are very nice but I feel the hotel is let down by cutting costs in areas which are important such as guest comfort and wellbeing.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel”
Reviews.Author: enthutravelleruk
Reviews.Content: good 4 star hotel, spacious rooms, nice decor, excellent breakfast choice, very helpful frontdesk staff, less than 5 mins walk from El Maresme forum underground station and diagonal mar mall. Bang opposite the science museum and tram station, 15 mins by train/tram from cituadel olympica and barceloneta stations. Only issue, shower could be changed for a better powershower.

Reviews.Title: “Great value luxury stay in Barcelona.”
Reviews.Author: Goldstrad
Reviews.Content: This was my family's second stay at the Hotel Diagonal Zero and it lived up to the expectations of our first excellent visit in July 2011. The staff are extremely helpful and friendly. When our microwave failed to work the problem was quickly rectified. I think that the hotel is ideally situated near the metro and tram. Fares on the metro are very cheap with a 10 journey ticket. Journey time into the centre of Barcelona is about 20 minutes and the trains are very frequent. The hotel bedrooms are very quiet and comfortable. The range of foods for breakfast was excellent, well presented and tasty. We didn't use the hotel restaurant for other meals. However, there are a good variety of restaurants at the nearby Diagonal Mar Commercial Centre. This is definitely one of my most favourite hotels. Every city should have one.

Reviews.Title: “correct stay, not more”
Reviews.Author: chrissassen
Reviews.Content: This hotel is situated at around 10 min by cab from the center (barrio gotico). Must be max 10 years old. Can be reached also by tram or metro. Rooms are clean, beds a bit hard. Bar is OK and the patio too but mostly in the shadom in the evening. Rooms that had a sea view don't have it anymore (see previous reviews). A bit expensive for the location and the lack of view (my room had a view on a skeleton building (crisis, what crisis?) on the side of the hotel, not charming at all). The pool on the 17th is not heated, so quite difficult to swim at this time of the year, nice view on the utility building on the other side and on the sea and beach, plus power plant for the rest.

Reviews.Title: “A very positive experience”
Reviews.Author: Anton M Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: I loved my stay at Diagonal Zero through and through. Staff at the front desk were very friendly and efficient. The room was spacious and comfortable. But above all - i loved the atmosphere - warm and cosy interestingly despite the minimalist style.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: AnnerTramoreIreland
Reviews.Content: Great hotel with very comfortable rooms It was an experience for us as it was very technical with touch screen for all your lighting and air/con. Restaurant was excellent with lovely food and not too expensive. It is a bit outside the centre but the Metro at Maresme/Forum was just 200 mtrs away and 10 mins to Catalunya Square. There is a tram that stops right outside the hotel and connects with the Metro at various stops.We really enjoyed our stay there and the tram,metro and train system in Barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Modern. Spacious. Excellent spa and massage facilities”
Reviews.Author: jude123dee
Reviews.Content: Modern spacious bedrooms. Open plan but a window from bedroom into bathroom not a good or pleasant experience. Lighting and air con system led by touch screen electronics. This could be a bit off putting for some people. We found it frustrating and slow. The beds were very comfortable and we slept well. The spa and massage facilities were excellent. The chocolate massage and wrap were the best I.ve ever had. Rooms at the front of the hotel (while all rooms are identicle) have a nicer feeling about them. Rooms over looking the half built hotel next door are dreary and depressing. :-(((

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: yuka m Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: little bit far from center of city but its ok ! metro is very close to hotel and just10min to center of city very quiet we can relax verymuch we stayed lastnaight in barcerona ,take taxi to airport was about 35euro its verygood stuff is very kind to us ^^

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Lefty_59
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Diagonal Zero for three nights and enjoyed our stay although we did have a bit of trouble getting used to all of the modern technology. The room was quite spacious and the beds very comfortable. I found the staff very helpful and did give us all kinds of information to make our stay more pleasant. We found breakfast rather expensive if compared to what we had in other hotels throughout Spain. This hotel is situated just a short distance from the metro - about a 5 minute walk and also a shopping center that has all kinds of restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Stylish hotel away from the centre.”
Reviews.Author: ROGER K Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: This was a very stylish hotel with excellent facilities. The customer service was lacking in some areas of the hotel as staff were so busy getting the job done they forget the customer. The beds were comfortable and rooms were of a very good size. The spa and gym facilities were adquate and clean. The hotel is near a shopping centre but some distance away from the centre of Barcelona. The transport links to central of Barcelona were great.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in Barcelona!”
Reviews.Author: Julie E
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed at Hotel Diagonal Zero and loved it. We were looking for a hotel that would be close to the beach, the metro and buses and would have a spa as well as spaces for lounging and relaxing. This hotel had it all and more. The staff at the front desk was wonderful. They spoke many languages and were always ready to help by unloading our car and helping us to the room, to room service to directions around the town. They were polite and eager to help. We were very pleased. We also loved the spa and the roof top pool as well as the outdoor lounge off the bar area. We were just a block from the metro and were able to go everywhere we wanted easily. Also the price was reasonable. I will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: sushila p Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: the only thing i like to say for improvement is we can have kettle in the room , other wise everything was very good . it was kind of the hotel to let us check in early as we arrived at the hotel 10am as we travel through night time.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay, kickass views!”
Reviews.Author: Sagrr A
Reviews.Content: Fantastic location, right by the beach. Friendly staff, nearby shopping mall for food, terrace pool and floor 17 has panoramic views of the city. Great rooms, super amenities, free usage of the safe. The tram stops right outside and the metro station is on the next street. Floor 17 also has sun-bathing chairs, where we would just lay looking at the gorgeous sea :)

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant, affordable 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Anthony D
Reviews.Content: Myself and my girlfriend stayed in the diagonal Zero for 3 nights during Mid february. The location of the hotel is situated a long distance away from the city centre of Barcelona. However there are sufficient amount of transpotation in the area including the Metro - nearest station is El Maresme Forum - which is 5 minutes away and the Tram Stop is across the road from the main entrance of the hotel. ByTaking either one of these transport system will take a few minutes. In addition there are public bikes to rent out for 2 euros as well. The area is nice and spacious with a large shopping centre (Diagonal mar) which consists of wide ranges of retail stores, a large supermarket and dining restaurants. In the hotel, the delux room was spacious, the cleanliness was good and the scenery was good as we could see the sea front. The roof top swimming pool was on the 17th floor and it was absolutely great. The views were satisfactory. The staff were very polite and attentive. When we checked in, the Personnel accompanied us to our room and provided us with a tour around the room which me and my girlfriend found very considerate of him. On the first day, we had difficulty handling our safe box; we called the reception and a member of staff arrived within 5 minutes who manage to amend the problem.

Reviews.Title: “Suits it's purpose”
Reviews.Author: Hollistarr
Reviews.Content: Overall a pleasantly good hotel for a city break as it was emaculatley clean and found the bedrooms very good. However we did have some disappointments: • free tea and coffee in the room using the microwave • freezing cold pool • No option to change currency in the hotel • not a very good explanation of the hotel it's self, for example telling us where the facilities are like the spa and Internet cafe.

Reviews.Title: “typical 4 star hotel....”
Reviews.Author: zoomendoscopist
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the diagonal zero for 4 nights while attending a congress. The area near the hotel is not nice, however, the metro station is nearby and you can visit the centre in a few minutes The rooms are spacious, mattress is moderate, views are poor. The decoration is modern but on the poor side. Breakfast was ok, but i consider it unacceptable to drink disgusting coffee from a machine in a 4 star hotel...it shows lack of respect for the client. The Personnel was very polite. There is a very good gym in the hotel and free wifi which is very important.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: sandersandrew
Reviews.Content: As noted in other reviews, this hotel is quite far out of the way of central Barcelona. This makes it difficult to get back to late at night if you are unfamiliar with the transport system (the metro often stops at midnight). The area itself is actually quite nice, with a large shopping centre offering a good selection of dining options. We stayed in a jacuzzi suite which was really nice. We had a problem with the hot water on the first morning of our stay and reception sent a maintenance person within about 5 minutes who fixed the problem. The room was otherwise clean and all the facilities worked well. Our room was actually quite warm, unlike some of the others reviewed below. Certain rooms give you access to a lounge on the 15th floor which has free drinks, but is only restocked a few times through the day. It has access to a terrace which would be a great place to hang out on a nice day. There was a coffee machine which did not work at all during our stay, although the staff said we could get coffee from the downstairs bar if we wished. My wife also had a great experience in the spa on the first basement level. I found the staff to be very helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Cold room in winter and heating was not working”
Reviews.Author: patjem
Reviews.Content: The room was very cold and airconditioning could not heat and did not work properly. Had to call several times to reception. Food quality was very low from roomservice and tasteless. The staff in the restaurant was not very friendly while I was sitting and working on my laptop there after breakfast they nearly send me out.

Reviews.Title: “Out of the way, but worth it.”
Reviews.Author: TravelmodeEngaged
Reviews.Content: If you have been to Barcelona, you will know that location is a key requirement for a hotel. The Diagonal Zero is a luxurious modern boutique hotel, a bit of a walk from the centre of the city, but there is a Metro station (Line 4) located just down the road. The room itself, although a standard room, was very modern, clean and spacious. The Bathroom and shower were of a good size too. I did find that the room was awfully warm after I had been out all day and the AC had not been on. A nice feature of the room was the USB input for my iPod. I usually keep a 3.5mm audio jack to RCA so I can listen to my iPod on the TV. The only downside to the hotel was, like with many hotels, the room service, hastily prepared, yet still managed to arrive cold and sometimes undercooked. I had to use the phone a lot while I was in this hotel, something which I do not recommend, the pricing was horrendous. Of course, a lot of factors come into play when using hotel landlines to phone overseas mobile phones, but I didn't expect a bill for €348. Overall, I really enjoyed Barcelona and hotel stay in the Diagonal Zero again, but next time I want an executive suite, the one with the Jacuzzi!

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: enjoyTravelling2011
Reviews.Content: I stay for 3 nights in a business trip, the hotel is beautiful and the room was suburb. It’s far from the city town but have the beach nearby and a subway station pretty close. For sure I will come back again

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place, will come again”
Reviews.Author: Lana K
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our overall stay in Barcelona and this hotel was part of our joy and satisfaction. Very good location for both business and leisure purposes, sea view, comfortable room, excellent room service, the staff at reception was very helpful and friendly. Perfect place, so in future we'll always choose this hotel to stay in Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “OK”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: The location is good with a park and the Blue museum opposite and close to subway. The room was very clean and big with a nice central wardrobe, safe, nice lcd with many channels. Many choices items for breakfast. I used the services of the spa - really nice and relaxing - and the gym. Terrible Internet connection.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Diagonal Zero, Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: NeVeR2LaTe77
Reviews.Content: The Hotel was good easy access to the tram & metro nice view on the beach but poor service we had to wait till 3.00 pm to get our rooms. strict police control prior getting to breakfast. i have asked the reception to call a room & the duplicated the room access card ... THE NEED TO BE MORE FRIENDLY

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Diagonal Zero, Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Gretchengdm
Reviews.Content: The hotel and its location was great. It was easy to get to from the autovia, it had private parking, and when traveling with dogs there was grass behind the building which was handy. It was close to a metro stop that took you directly to Bari Gothic and the Sagra. Comfortable beds, clean, attractive rooms and lobby, the only negative was the ice machine didn't work on several of the floors.

Reviews.Title: “Less is sometimes more”
Reviews.Author: Dieselhans
Reviews.Content: Hotel was standard, breakfast was SO! poor. Executive rooms have acces to 15th lounge but in bar there was only beer and some coca-cola, sprite (Open bottles of wine - no thx:-))) Spa OK but very small sauna and hammam so we have to wait till it will be accesible. Room nothing special - see view = building (offices) view:-))) Price is ok but I don´t recommend - hotel was not for me friendly.

Reviews.Title: “great advertising, bad result”
Reviews.Author: jkraft9992
Reviews.Content: we had to wait about 6 hours until the staff cleaned our room, the service was really bad, the woman at the reception was unfriendly, at the breakfast they didn't take care about us as hotel guests, there was no service while eating, when i pay 290€ per night i expect friendly,civilly and heedful hotel staff. The location of the hotel was about 5 minutes away from the next metro station, but about 20 minutes by metro to the city center, unfortunately we had to note, that there were a lot of things to repair and to clean in our room, when i wanted to dry my hair after taking a shower the hair dryer was missing, after calling the room service with the advice 'the hair dryer must be in the toilet' i found it covert in our wardrobe.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic city, fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: aamerzahid
Reviews.Content: We now make it a point to stay at this hotel whenever we visit barcelona. The hotel is well situated , next to a metro and a very useful shopping center that includes a grocery store etc But what we fine very good is the hotel...very reasonably priced. The reception desk is very very kind and helpful. In addition the bell boys are always around to help. We have tried both the breakfast and restaurant for dinner etc it was surprisingly very good. We highly recommend the hotel and hope that the prices remain the same ....the staff is very welcoming. They are fluent in several languages incl English. Rooms are large and well equipped....bathrooms are modern and very clean. TV channels offerings are OK but not great.

Reviews.Title: “As good as the advertising”
Reviews.Author: André B B
Reviews.Content: My wife and I spent a short week to celebrate her birthday. The hotel is very good situated. 200m from the beach. 10min by tram or metro in the city. 100m from a shopping centre. The hotel is what what it promises to by. The staff is very friendly. We were very happy to stay in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Ok for the price. Good location to stay out of city traffic.”
Reviews.Author: 18Joseph18
Reviews.Content: It is a few minutes from the littoral belt (ronda de litoral) which allows to bypass Barcelona from North <--> South, allowing fast access to the airport and city center. The hotel has a new feel, but it's a victim of some "creative Catalan architect" out to show he has some Gaudi in him, apparently, which leads to absurdities and less safety. Like how people in the room can see into the bathroom glass window with only a semi-transparent blind. The bathroom soap dispensers are a pain, literally. The front ceramic cover has sharp edges against which I cut my hand when washing my hands and trying to use without looking. The sink has an unconventional design whose sole result seem to waste useful top space. Otherwise, fine. Good service.

Reviews.Title: “So much good, but too much bad”
Reviews.Author: catherinejoywilson
Reviews.Content: This is a lovely hotel. It is grand and has all the nice add ons you'd expect. The front of house staff were lovely and friendly. It is too far from the city centre to be accessible by foot (over 40 minute walk). It is also obviously newly refurbished and our bathroom had a leak. We also didn't have a kettle which was a problem, and trying to request one from the non-english speaking housekeeping staff was a big challenge. I think maybe this hotel is a case of style over substance?

Reviews.Title: “OVERALL A NICE HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: ANANDBHANSALI
Reviews.Content: We had gone there for our business trip for 3nts from 22nd Sept.The hotel was conveniently located from the city and had good transport options.There was a mall just opposite the hotel.Overall a good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “GOOD”
Reviews.Author: varz_84
Reviews.Content: it is a very good hotel with good rooms. food is good. rooms are spacious.have special lounge for some rooms.which is very good. very friendly staff.have bar inside hotel.and is just opposite beach. and casino is very near by.

Reviews.Title: “Daily Air Conditioner/ Heater Issues”
Reviews.Author: CoganCorp
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Diagonal Zero Barcelona for 4 days recently. The property and amentias were beautiful and impressive. This wow only goes so far if comfort is not included. The Diagonal Zero staff failed to resolve a simple problem that in turn made it very uncomfortable for our stay. We experienced problems with the air conditioner / heater in the room every day of our 4 day stay. We called the front desk every day (6+ times) requesting the problem be remedied and even requested a room change with no resolve from their staff. The unit either did not work or made a loud clanking/banging noise when it did work. Several times the unit woke us up in the middle of the night with the only resolve being to turn it off. Our last night entailed two calls in the middle of the night to the front desk because the unit would not turn on. After the second call to the agent tells us he has to turn it on at the front desk. We even had one agent tell us to use just the low fan because the high fan makes noises in most of the rooms. This problem should have been an easy fix resolved with 1 call or a simple move to a room with a operational unit. After sending a complaint to Corporate they in turn offered us a free night’s stay in an executive suite the next time we were in Barcelona, a solution that should have been offered the first night after the problem was brought to their attention.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't be happier at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: nycgal529
Reviews.Content: We stayed here both before and after our cruise. Everyone at the hotel is extremely helpful and courteous. The hotel is kept immaculate. We had no issues whatsoever. There is a Metro station nearby --- Maresme Forum (line 4). The tram also stops in front of the hotel. The Shopping Mall is across the street. Although is is not centrally located, it is in a quiet area and was not a problem getting to. Hotel has free WiFi which was great to keep in touch.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for exploring the city”
Reviews.Author: macanila
Reviews.Content: Although location is remote from main attractions , is a very new and modern city area, 250 meters from the sea , good shopping mall across the street , and touristic bus stop at 100 meters. Metro station for L4 is in immediate vicinity as well. Hi tech room , good breakfast , good and professional service. Nothing special to remember about but in a good way , so the experience has only positive sides.

Reviews.Title: “nothing special - lack of customer focus”
Reviews.Author: Gerald250
Reviews.Content: Overall this is not a terrible hotel, but it lacks maturity in the service area: - tried to use the spa for massages twice without success: * Sunday on arrival, after having booked a request online, which was apparently never received... not sure if staff knew what I was talking about. *Monday in afternoon (around 4.00PM). Felt that they did not much care about the client, or about their business. Considering their rather high rates, they missed out on 300 euros of billing. - Gym: good assortment of machines, free weights + a window on the outside, which is a big plus when compared to most underground gyms at European hotels. But, no towels before 10.00AM, when most business people would agree that the time to use the gym is usually between 6 and 8.00AM. - Spa: sauna, jacuzzi. No access available, despite having booked an all-inclusive fare. Not sure what I really paid for. - Lounge at Level 15: not sure the coffee machine is the best around. Gave up trying to make it work after 10'. Drinks are available, but no food around either in morning or late afternoon. - Restaurant: I completely missed the restaurant. It did look closed every time I looked that way, so I ended up eating in other places in town or around the hotel. More euros missed by the hotel team. - Room: OK. Bed is just OK. I have experienced much better (try Marriott Berlin). TV had no pay movies, just a few TV stations. All in all, this stay was disappointing for me. I am visiting Barcelona on a regular basis, and believe that I have not yet found my ideal hotel. Will keep looking around.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic conference hotel in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: sotutu
Reviews.Content: I attended a Medical Congress at the Barcelona International Conference Centre which is just across the road from the hotel - it was therefore perfectly located in this respect. The hotel is also very close to the beach and has a large shopping mall nearby. The underground station is within a block from the hotel, and trams and buses stop nearby. There is also a constant source of taxis nearby. It is easy to get in to the city centre on the metro. The staff at the hotel are friendly and very helpful, particularly at the front desk. Fabrizio is 'the man' - great to find an All Black supporter in Spain!! (my visit took place during Rugby World Cup time). The facilities are top notch. We had an executive room with sea views and had a wonderful time. Costs for doing laundry in the hotel are a little steep - we found a laundromat in the nearby mall. Everything is electronically monitored, so don't let your kids start shifting the snacks and drinks in the minibar around as you may need to buy them! Overall an excellent hotel option for Barcelona. Thanks to all the staff who made our time in Barcelona so memorable.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: joe f
Reviews.Content: Very handy to the convention center across the road. Two minutes walk to the underground for easy access to the city center. Clean and comfortable. Reception staff were excellent (Fabrizio & Alesandro especially). The touch screen in the room drove me daft until a member of staff showed me the superior effects of a ball point pen (!). Even then it took an age to cool the room through inefficient air con. Breakfast was very boring. Executive suite on 15th floor a real advantage (but they could be faster at replacing the snacks).

Reviews.Title: “Quality hotel, lacking little details.”
Reviews.Author: ZICO1982
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a 3 night stay sightseeing. Location is not right in the centre but very good transport links with both bus, tram & city tour routes right outside of the door which takes 10 mins to the Glories metro station which is 4 stops from Catalunya Sq. Very close to the beach and a large shopping centre, Diagonal Mar opposite the hotel with a good selection of shops & restaurants. Choose the executive room which gives you access to the 15 floor which is great to chill on the large balcony with access to free drink & snacks. Negatives: The airconditioning is terrible which does not help with comfortable sleep. Coffee making facilities in the room but no kettle or cutlery. breakfast if very basic & not good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Modern Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Gammy418
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the night before our Med. Cruise. Service was good and the hotel was very nice. Close to Metro and taxis are right outside. Nice, quiet modern hotel at a good price!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Aussie-Traveller598
Reviews.Content: First of all, yes the hotel is a little way out of the city centre.. which you can clearly see before booking the hotel. Pros: The metro is literally a 5 minute walk, very close. We used the metro to go everywhere & it was great. The hotel itself is fantastic, modern & spacious rooms. Staff were ALWAYS friendly & super helpful. The hotel is right across the road from a big shopping complex & pharmacies. Pool is great but the area is completely taken over by a lot of people sunbaking. I used the spa service, it was lovely. My partner & I stayed here for 7 nights & couldn't fault any of the hotel services. Cons: The only negatives we found were actually in relation to the other guest staying in the hotel. Not the hotel at all. We found that most of the hotel guests were a bit older. I wouldn't recommend staying with kids.. as 99% of the people we encountered were very 'posh' & I saw a few well behaved kids getting told to stop swimming around so roughly in the pool.. I personally look forward to meeting & socializing with other people from around the world, we failed to meet anyone who could manage a smile in the public areas of the hotel. This didn't impact our stay hugely, I think it's just worth making note of. Basically, Don't bring the family & if being surrounded by snobby people bothers you, look else where. If this doesn't bother you at all I would gladly recommend the hotel & I'm sure there would have to be some friendly people hiding out there somewhere! Very very good hotel :)

Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel”
Reviews.Author: ohlnielsen
Reviews.Content: Stayed 3 nights for business, everything works well, all amenities are in place and staff is helpfull. Did not try the wellness sections. Almost no noise from other guests. Located outside central BCN but only 15-20 minutes by metro to city center. 5 minutes walk from the beach/promenade. Would have scored 4 (very good) if breakfast was better, air condition could be left on when not in room and bathroom was more spacious. A very good 3-star hotel (although classified as 4-star).

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel,great staff, great city”
Reviews.Author: Sokino
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 nights here and we loved it. Travel to city center was so easy. There are 2 metro exit near the hotel (app. 100m) and a tram which stops in front of the hotel. Our room was at 13th flour with lounge &spa acess and a great see view. Lighting system is modern, rooms have touchscreens to control and get information. Isolating was good. Rooms are big and clean. Cofee and tea facilities and a microvave. Staff was very helpfull and friendly. They asked how our flight was, if we enjoyed to barcelona , how we are, etc. Free wi-fi and pc are also available at the bussiness center and its free. There are lots of small cafe&restaurants around the hotel with reasonable prices and a small kiosk which is open 24h. You can have a lunch around 6-8 € . It was great 4 days and we will back. Thank you for everything!

Reviews.Title: “I would look elsewhere for a hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Lilabee
Reviews.Content: I suppose "You get what you pay for" fits here. This does not feel like a 4 star hotel. The staff behave like kids just out of hotel school. The entirely (and unnecessarily) computerized lighting and air conditioning system is very glitchy and annoying. The breakfast is way overpriced, the design is, well, not really a design...the rooms are fine, not great, sticky wood laminate floors, poorly designed showers. It is WAY out of the city center, which means you will spend a ton of time on the tram and subway. Barcelona is also a rather smelly city, and this neighborhood gets the worst of it. You would be much better off finding a 3 star hotel closer to the city for a similar price.

Reviews.Title: “Absoultely loved this hotel”
Reviews.Author: ozeeboy
Reviews.Content: Stayed with my wife and our two teens at this ultra modern hotel before and after a Med cruise in Sept 2011. PROS: I'd rate it 5 star plus. Ultra modern, rooftop pool, shopping mall across street, very clean, microwaves in room, mood lighting in room, walk to Med beach area, metro to city one block away (about 8 stops to Place de Catalunya area). Staff ultra friendly, helpful and cheerful. Bathrooms even have bidets and phones. We booked a family room for four (two connecting rooms through Zuji/Travelocity) for about $240 Aussie per night (approx $250USD). The same hotel in Paris would be 400-500 Euro plus! CONS: Not in the city heart, lacks old world character and local dining choices limited to shopping mall area but who needs the noise of La Ramblas at 3am? The cost of a cab to the airport is about 50 Euro for four because of its northern beaches location. Mattresses a bit firm to suit Euro preferences. Have travelled 25 US States, urban Canada, Europe and this is one of the nicest modern properties I've stayed at in recent years. Wish we'd stayed longer.

Reviews.Title: “Modern design far, far away”
Reviews.Author: StellaRossaSeattle
Reviews.Content: I traveled to Barcelona for business, and our meetings were located outside of the city. Our hosts selected this hotel, and given their office's location I can see why. The access to the freeway is very easy. However, I stayed for a few extra days for sightseeing. The hotel is not centrally located, therefore, I spent quite a bit of time using the conveniently located Metro or in taxis. My room was a double and faced the incompleted construction of the future wing of the hotel (no construction is going on - not noisy). Although it was not a very nice view, I was happy that it was quiet. The rooms are very clean - hardwood floors, wood millwork, porcelain tile bathroom. Everything is very modern, a bit trendy, yet comfortable. Would have preferred a desk and lamp rather than a pair of chairs and round bistro table. Bathroom is very clean and modern with water closet, bidet, Duravit vessel sink and Duravit bathtub/shower. The shower is very slippery so be careful. The water in the hotel (or in Barcelona?) is very alkaline. It took a long time to feel clean from soap residue. Bed was very comfortable and I slept well. One odd thing is there is no clock in the room. Phones do not have any features that allow one to receive messages or to call someone else's room directly. There is a touch screen that controls all the lighting, air conditioner, etc. Be sure to get an orientation on how to use this, as the entry light can only be controlled by the panel. The lighting could be improved, but they were going for design over function. Mechanical system was pretty quiet and non-intrusive. The breakfast was included as part of the room rate. Since there are few choices in the area for a quick bite, I was happy to have access to food - hams, cold cuts, cheeses, fresh fruit, juice, torta, eggs, bacon, etc. Coffee choices are available through a machine - so so, but again, happy to have some caffeine. The rooms have microwaves, but the refrigerator is weighted to monitor consumption of the minibar. Pool area on the roof is lovely and quiet, although I did not partake of a swim nor use the Fitness Center or Spa located on the lower floor.

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend”
Reviews.Author: Jaroslava M
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Diagonal Zero in Barcelona for 1 week. Would not recommend to book a room specially with a sea view. The view is more of a joke and waste of money. In general, the hotel facilities were a bit expensive. But overall was ok and we enjoyed Barcelona a lot. The last day, we had a very unpleasant encounter with the front desk supervisor regarding the breakfast price. This was the first time we took breakfast at the hotel and we understood the price is EUR 8.00 per person for hotel guests. But as it came out, you can only avail of this price when you take this breakfast every morning. So they charged us EUR 18.00 per person instead. This amount appeared unreasonable for a crappy coffee form a machine. The front desk supervisor talked to us like to 3th class citizens and became aggressive at some point. We left for our plane home in a very confused mood and are definitely not planning to return to Hotel Diagonal Zero. Jaroslava

Reviews.Title: “right hotel,distant location.”
Reviews.Author: Salaciousdave
Reviews.Content: having been to the city over 30 times i would imagine i'm qualified to review this hotel. The hotel is very clean,staff are helpful and friendly and the pool area is a godsend. i have two gripes. 1.the location is just that bit too far out and limits your ability to be a part of things. 2. there was three tall adult males booked in and we requested 3 single beds. what we got was an uncomfortable single bed that cut off at the shins and a small double bed to be shared. not good.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, lovely Staff”
Reviews.Author: DubCM
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel recently with some friends and had a lovely weekend break in Barcelona. As there was a festival on we couldn’t get accommodation in the centre, and while this hotel is a little far out, the metro station is close by and operates so well that it is not a problem, 10 minutes and you are in the centre of Barcelona. From the minute we arrived at the hotel and the porter took our bags, all the staff we met were very friendly and couldn’t have been more helpful. The foyer itself is very light and airy and we were quickly seen to by reception, our room wasn’t ready, however as we arrived before 10 am, we didn’t expect it to be. They took our bags, provided maps and information on how to get around. We returned later and were quickly seen to and shown to our rooms. The complimentary welcome bottle of Cava in your room is a nice touch. The room itself was very spacious, well lit, the lighting and ac systems were very easy to operate. There is no kettle but there is a microwave, however they never provided us with more than one cup although there were two of us in the room. The window into the bathroom was a bit strange but there was a blind you could use. The shower partition was not long enough and it was impossible not to drown the bathroom when you took a shower. The toiletries offered were very poor, bring your own. We didn’t have breakfast as we felt at 18 euro it was too expensive, we used a cafe nearby on the morning we arrived, which was nice, every other morning we headed into the centre. The pool on the roof is small and shaded by another tall building for much of the morning. The gym downstairs is well equipped, we didn’t use the spa. We visited the terrace bar once, and it is a nice place to chill out after a day of sightseeing. I would use this hotel again if I returned to Barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Short Break”
Reviews.Author: David T
Reviews.Content: We chose the hotel after reviewing comments from many others on trip advisor. We were not disappointed. We were made welcome on arrival. The selection and quailty of food at breakfast was excellent. Would recommend this hotel. Whilst it is not in the centre of the city it is near to the Metro with trams, buses and taxis outside of the hotel and a good selection of reasonably priced resturants. For a reasonable snack recommend the Canas y Tapas on roof of Diagonal Forum shopping centre - 5 minutes walk from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “small pool but fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ashraf A
Reviews.Content: we stayed for 3 nights at diagonal zero. staff were very friendly and helpful. hotel rooms were very clean. the rooftop swimming pool was small but adequate. would have recommended whole hearteadly had it not been for the location which is a bit out of the city centre.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable party hotel, not great for families with kids”
Reviews.Author: Russco5star
Reviews.Content: The rooms and prices looked good and the pool looked attractive online, however the reality was different. I booked a family room which is really 2 separate bedrooms next to each other behind another door for privacy which was meant to lock but didn't. My kids room smelt like someone had smoked 100 cigarettes in it and had drugs and booze on the table when we checked in. They cleaned but the smell didn't go away for all 3 days and they would not change the rooms. The pool is tiny and over crowded with hardly any beds to lie on which is quite difficult with kids in a very hot city. Well done for offering free WiFi but making people check into your Facebook page every time is very irritating. Overall it is good value but it is most suited to weekend getaways for young party couples or mates.

Reviews.Title: “Nice location but the service......”
Reviews.Author: carlago54
Reviews.Content: Strategically located near the El Maresme subway station it is possible to reach the Old Part of Barcelona in a couple of minutes. The rooms are wide and comfortable, even if, as in my case, it is not difficult to be forced to stay in a room where the smoking smell has filled everywhere. Breakfast are complete and prepared in a modern and clean environment. And now the defects: wellness area access not included in the price, service levels at all insufficient (some examples one hr and half to have a banal jam plate in room, cleaning service not adequate), wireless access too weak in the room.

Reviews.Title: “A beatiful experience”
Reviews.Author: Bledigj
Reviews.Content: It was first time in Barcelona and it was a wonderful hotel. Everything was perfect and in the right place.

Reviews.Title: “Top hotel. Great location. Perfect staff. Highly recommended.”
Reviews.Author: zz01
Reviews.Content: What a great hotel is this! Perfect staff as well. Rooms are very nice. View is spectaculair. We stayed in a Executive Room, and gives you free acces to level 15 (lounge with free drinks and snacks) and the 17th floor (swimming pool). Spa and fitness completes this top hotel. Shopping mall with fine shops within 200 meters.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: BozeatManzis
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in Jan 2011 but only just got round to writing review as have been busy at work and pregnant!! We travelled to Barcelona for medical treatment and needed a good, modern, quiet hotel we could stay in and relax after the treatment and this hotel was perfect. The spa was out of this world and I had some great treatments which really aided in the relaxation part of our trip. We stayed in an executive room which gave us free access to the spa area and pools and also gave us free access to the roof terrace, which had a fully stocked complimentary bar with snacks you help yourself to until about 8pm. The views from the roof terrace are incredible. The bedroom was spacious, clean and very modern with great views. It had tea and coffee making facilities and a microwave as well as flat screen TV and very modern lighting and air con planel (which took a bit of getting used to) The bathroom was great - again very modern. We only ate breakfast at the hotel but it was fabulous every time we also used the bar, which again was great. There is a business centre and internet access you can use for free which was great for us booking our return journey home. You are very close to the metro and so to explore Barcelona is very easy from here. The beach is also just a 5 minute walk away. The staff were very helpful and kind and all in all we had a great time and certainly caterered for all our needs. We will be back for a leisure trip some time in the next few years.

Reviews.Title: “very nice modern hotel in the heart of barcelona”
Reviews.Author: md9333
Reviews.Content: I picked this hotel for the location and the price. I was surprised how nice this place was. It was a short walk from the metro, the beach, many restaurants, and really cool park with artsy sculptures, and a mall. The hop on hop off bus was close to here as well. There was a really nice pool and the rooms were very large for European standards. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Wrong location.”
Reviews.Author: Candice_and_I
Reviews.Content: Service was nice, was greeted by the receptionist with a rather LARGE smile lol and we were checked in almost immediatly. We stayed in the standard double bedroom which was nice & spacious. Bathroom was cool & had a window with a view of the bed adding additional intamacy. The roof terrace was beautiful with a wide range of complimentary drinks. The location was a big let down and not anywhere near the best part of the beach, I guess this was due to being located within the business quarter. Overal I de say this was a nice hotel especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: “a good plae to stay!”
Reviews.Author: akis a
Reviews.Content: located in a area near sea,metro tram and bus! comfort room but some problem with the bath water! generally a pleasure staying!

Reviews.Title: “Really good hotel in a fantastic city...”
Reviews.Author: Robtrip84
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my girlfriends six days in this hotel really modern and with all confort. The hotel area is not central but with 10 minutes of metro it's possible to arrive without any effort in the heart of Barcelona, having as advantage to avoid caos and confusion durign the night. The hotel bulding is new (no more than 4-5 years) with a scenographic pool in the last floor and a preatty sea view. The rooms are really big for two people, with large bathroom and electronic systems to manage lights and air conditioning. The breakfast was a huge continental buffet with many type of foods to satisfy each need. In two words: a fantastic hotel for a fantastic city!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: europewedding_massi
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is in a relatively new area of the City, which allows you to enjoy beautiful beach acorss the street (5 mins) and quite area of town, only about 5 stops from the main centre. The structure is very nice, and serivce and rooms are impeccable. I really have to say that there has been absolutely nothing wrong at all with this Venue

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: Gold77
Reviews.Content: We had booked a triple room on the hotel website, which stated there should be an extra single bed and as well, "free" seaview from the room. When we checked in for our 5 night stay, we were given a regular double room on the 5th floor. I called and said I had booked a triple, and the answer I got, was that they could provide an extra bed. I thought I had booked a larger room, not a stuffed double! The room had no remote control for the tv, no ice bucket - and the ice machine on the floor was broken for the whole stay, the bed was hard and uncomfortable with hard pillows and only sheets to cover yourself with, the high tech system to regulate lights and temperature made us both freeze and sweat through the night, and the worst part was the housekeeping. Every day except the last day, I had to call to get towels. One day they removed the old ones without replacing them, another they gave us 1 new, the third they just hanged up the dirty ones we had left on the floor and so it went on. I normally don't mind using my towel twice, but with a baby and the heat outside, we needed fresh towels every day, which I told the front desk several times. All they could say, was "we're sorry", and then the same thing happened the next day. The tiny pool on the 17th floor was crowded, with only a few sunbeds, so we headed for the beach instead. The hotel charges 3 euros for use of towels at the pool. As a frequent traveler, I thought this only happened at 3 star hotels. It's forbidden to use the room towels outside the pool (if you are lucky to get any), they charge you for pool towels (if you are lucky to get a sunbed or chair), the minibar stated that you will be charged directly if you move any items (which I hardly believe, as there is no sensor there) and the staff in the well-equipped gym chase you out 15 minutes before closing time. We were glad to leave, and having stayed at several other hotels in Barcelona earlier, we would not recommend this hotel. The nearby Hilton Diagonal Mar for instance, is in another league! Get services up to par, give guests the room they have booked and paid for, train the staff to show interest and hospitality and spend your time, money and effort on keeping employees and guest more important than the fancy design-wrapping of the exterior.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: GTravellerx
Reviews.Content: Stayed at hotel for 3 nights. Hotel is fairly new and is within walking distance of the beach, shopping centre and the tram stop is literally outside which is very convenient. Stop for tour bus also near (across the road). Took buffet breakfast deal which got from hotel which worked out economical, otherwise if not I would have been dissapointed as it's not really worth the €18 normal charge. Had a triple room to accommodate myself and two children. Room adequately accommodated us. Hotel staff though polite were a bit surly which is in contrast to other postings of how they went over and beyond their calls of duties. Took multiple phone calls to get assistance with room accident. Room is equipped with a small computer screen which controls lights via touch button. There is also a microwave. Pool on 17th floor is small, but still nice with great views. Bar terrace was nice too especially at night. Overall, a pleasant experience.

Reviews.Title: “beautiful, would definetly use again!”
Reviews.Author: urv123
Reviews.Content: stayed here for a weekend, had the most fantastic time, although i should say the rooms arent made for families or otherwise as the bathroom has a see-through'ish screen! (im sure this may be seen from other peoples pictures!). The room itself was very big, however the bed was a bit TOO firm for my liking, and found the sofa in the room more comfortable to sleep on! but this obviously varies from person to person, we just like it quite soft! Other downside was that our king size bed was 2 seperate beds pushed together. The room had 2 floor to ceiling windows which made the room feel brighter and more airy. Reception were helpful. Found Port Olympia to be a bit further out than expected, about a 10 minute taxi drive, we were under the impression it was walking distance from the hotel! would definetly stay again though, also had a nice outdoor pool on the top floor of the hotel which we used! :) .....id rate it 8/10 in all!

Reviews.Title: “Great, modern hotel with good free drinks package and decking area”
Reviews.Author: joby69
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel before a cruise in July and paid a little extra for a room which included access to a lounge with free drinks and nibbles which was very nice and we had access to a really nice decking area and the spa. There is a nice, but small pool on the top floor which was adequate to cool down but there are limited loungers but then in Barcelona, this type of pool is the norm. There are a number of PCs on the first floor which provide free internet access which was very useful. The room was very nice and had a sea view. The bathroom had lot of extras but it has a window from the bedroom into the bathroom which had a blind but you could see through it when the light was on in the bathroom. There was a wall in front of the toilet so you were unable to see someone on the toilet but you possibly could see someone in the shower which my son was obviously nervous about but we got by :-) The breakfast was standard and I would suggest having breakfast in one of the many bars just outside given the cost. The bar is nice on the ground floor and the outside area is very nice and relaxing. Location wise, it is away from the main city area but is commutable into the city with excellent links. There is a great shopping mall just down the road on the opposite side with lots of great shops and places to eat (great tapas). The reception staff are very helpful and are happy to hold your luggage for you if needed.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with very nice rooms and sea view.”
Reviews.Author: ian k
Reviews.Content: Nice interiors throughout the hotel and the rooms. Staff very helpful, accommodating and willing to assist. English speaking too. Location was not the most central and required two underground lines to get to most places. However, there was a large shopping mall next door that had a large supermarket, lots of eateries and even a primark hehe. And only 100m away from underground stop and the waterfront. Room had a microwave, bed was comfortable, windows opened, aircon, fridge... Not sure about the frosted glass window into the bathroom doesn't hide much so maybe not useful for friend's sharing? Bar and outside drinking area was nice. Swimming pool was not heated. I would consider staying in this hotel again. Taxi from airport cost €26, taxi from hotel cost €30.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, clean, modern, trendy hotel with lovely bathroom”
Reviews.Author: C C
Reviews.Content: We only stayed one night but had most of 2 days sightseeing in Barcelona with fairly grown up family in 2 bedrooms. Hotel happy to look after our luggage. Perhaps in an area a bit far from the character of Barcelona, but very convenient for tram and subway. Also large shopping centre close by with lots of dining choice. Pool a bit crowded as our trip was in the heat of August and slightly disappointing that they charged for towel use. Very helpful porter showed us control panel for lights/aircon etc - all very hi-tech.

Reviews.Title: “if you are loking for a new hotel with a good price, ZERO is it!”
Reviews.Author: BachJan
Reviews.Content: I checked all the Barcelona hotels from net and at the end decided to stay at Hotel Diagonal Zero. The ones close to Larambda are either old or too expensive. The ones like Hotel Arts was over my budget. IF you check from the map Hotel Diagonal Zero may look a little bit far but with the metro it takes 15 min and with the taxi it takes 10 min to Laramda. By the way there is a nice shopping mall next tot the hotel that is so convenient. Hotel is new, staff is helpful. Free wifi every where. There is also a SPA which we didnt use. Anyway take a T10 metro ticket and stay at Hotel Diagonal Zero. For sure you will like it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent 'trendy' hotel”
Reviews.Author: Smilero
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights in busy early august. No real complaints about this hotel. Room was large and excellent. Very clean and comfortable. Lovely bathroom too. Tv excellent and good air con. Tea & coffee and ice facilities and mini bar. Ignore the daft minbar 'warning notices'.Theres no problem with putting your own water in. Pool was small but was great for a cool down dip. Breakfast was very good. The bar and outside terrace were lovely.... Its a whacky hotel. Cool decor. Metro is only a 5 minute walk and beach about 15. All in all a great hotel. The friendliest staff work in the bar, the breakfast room and the porters are also great!

Reviews.Title: “It was a very nice hotel, very relaxing outdoor lounge on main floor, nice pool area on roof top.”
Reviews.Author: candice j
Reviews.Content: A bit far from downtown and from the beach. We were on the metro twice a day both ways to go downtown. The beach is really 10-15 minutes away walking, but who wants to walk back in the heat...Next time we'll try to find a nice quiet hotel like this one, but closer to downtown if its possible...

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel with good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: TBTr
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel from Sunday to Friday in the beginning of August. We got to check in when we arrived even though we arrived around 11 AM and our reservations said that check-in time was 3 PM. We got to beds instead of one, but we could push them toghether so it was not a big deal. We prefered to get the room stragiht away. The room was nice and clean. The bathroom was also clean and okay size. The A/C was very quick to cool down the room, and that's nice after a day at the beach. According to booking.com the hotel is located 5 minutes from the beach. This is not correct. It's definitly a 10 minuts walk to the closest beach. This beach was really nice and clean and we stayed there almost every day. The last day we decided to check out the hotel pool. It's VERY small and when we were there there was no sunshine. But this was early - probably around 10 AM. The breakfast was not included in our room, but we paied 18 Euros to have it to days. 18 Euros is a bit stiff, but the breakfast was really really nice, so we thought it was worth it. Two days we went to the mall next to the hotel and got food from the hypermarked on the first floor to around 10 Euros for a lot of the same things that we got at the hotel. So if you're on a budget I would recommend that. According to the staff at the hotel there are not very many good restaurants close to the hotel. We walked or took a taxi to Port Olympic and took it from there. The staff was nice and helpful when we asked for help.

Reviews.Title: “Stay in town instead”
Reviews.Author: ontheroadagain222
Reviews.Content: This is an ultra-modern business hotel, but full of tourists. It's in a recently built area far from downtown that does not really capture Barcelona's feeling. I don't think it's appropriate as a place to stay in Barcelona. Go to the old city and stay in a grand old hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing stay”
Reviews.Author: BillericayBaggie
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from a 3 night break at The Diagonal Zero with my wife and youngest child aged 6. Really enjoyed the time spent at the hotel, great family room with helpful advice from the staff. 15 minute walk to the beach, 5 minute walk to the shopping centre and metro with a 20 minute ride to the city centre. Usefull outdoor terrace with a ping poing table. Drinks a little expensive and sometimes had to wait for breakfast a couple of days. Would recommend the hotel - very clean and great top floor terrace pool

Reviews.Title: “awfully good”
Reviews.Author: Bardozi
Reviews.Content: Excellent breakfast, friendly staff, free parking family room is composed of two spacious double rooms. parquet floors prevent allergenes from propagating. Only negative: On the website it was impossible to reserve the family room with more than one breakfast ! So the price was not quite as expected.

Reviews.Title: “Top notch place”
Reviews.Author: rodrigo_braz
Reviews.Content: This was a very good and convenient hotel with a few quirks. The location is very good, very close to the Metro although a bit removed from the center of town. Nothing that a 15-minute ride won't fix. It's right next to the convention center which is great if you're attending a conference there. They have a nice lounge on the 15th floor with free drinks and a beautiful view. The pool is a bit small, outside and not all that warm, if it is a chilly day. I tried taking a swim but it was too cold for that. The staff is super friendly and competent. The breakfast is included and pretty good, with lots of options. The room is pretty modern and stylish. However, this introduces a few quirks. There are switches for lights, but the air conditioning and the entrance light have to be controlled through a touchscreen that is not particularly sensitive and hence awkward to use. The fact that the entrance light needs to be turned off on the screen means that when you turn it off the screen is going to be on for a while so you don't get a completely dark room (there is no way to turn off the touchscreen; it goes off by itself after maybe 15 minutes). Another quirk is that the only lighf in the desk area is behind you, so you get a lot of glare on the screen of a computer. Finally, the shower box remains partially open and it is hard not to make the bathroom floor wet.

Reviews.Title: “State of the art and out of the bustle”
Reviews.Author: SA-to-wherever
Reviews.Content: We used the hotel as pre- and post cruise accommodation and stayed all together 5 nights. We loved it and would go back any day. It felt new, clean, sophisticated and quiet and was well appointed. It is out of the main touristy area of the city but connections to get around abound. The Metro station is a block away. The Tourist (hop on, hop off) bus stop is half a block away. The tram stop is right in front of the hotel. Taxis are plentiful. You can get to all the tourist spots in minutes using the Metro. After the bustle is was serene to come back to the hotel. Barcelona's biggest shopping mall is just across the street. All the staff were always friendly and always helpful and all spoke English. The breakfast included good variety from fresh fruit to a whole selection of pastries. The bacon is however baked and the fried eggs pre-made and could be better. The rooms are electronically very well done. You can control all the innovative lighting from various places in the room as well as from a touch panel where you can also set the air-conditioning. There are connections for PC's and iPod s and free wireless Internet. There is a microwave oven but no cutlery or crockery apart from the coffee/tea cups and spoons. We chose the Executive option and although the room is no better than the normal option the access to the Spa and Executive Lounge is actually good value should you make use of these venues. The lounge had nice snacks and a full bar included. The Spa is worth a visit.

Reviews.Title: “Bland breakfast”
Reviews.Author: rewaka
Reviews.Content: We stayed for five nights at this hotel for a conference. By the end we couldn't wait to leave due to the monotonous breakfast, below par cleanliness, and cold decor.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location to Olympic Park and close to city by Metro”
Reviews.Author: AndyFWimbledon
Reviews.Content: Modern and clean hotel, stylish and well appointed, room fittings were excellent, staff were very helpful and polite. Room was spotless, and kept at a very high level. Breakfast was very good, and not hurried. Whilst out of the city centre, don't be deterred as local buses and metro are excellent. Big shopping centre near by, local bars and cafe's for real Catalan feel.

Reviews.Title: “Not in a central location but it is still a great hotel! We will go back.”
Reviews.Author: Fitzgerald99
Reviews.Content: The hotel is not walking distance to la rambla but it's an easy Metro ride away. The metro station is only a few minutes walk from the hotel. The rooms are spotless and are very modern with free wifi. The hotel is in a nice location with a shopping centre across the road, good tram links and it is among very modern buildings. The pool on the roof is great, nice sun beds, a pool bar and amazing views across the city. There is a nice bar/restaurant at the back of the hotel but on more than 1 occasion we had to ask a few times to be served. Apart from this we loved it and will definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and location”
Reviews.Author: pmoreto
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for four nights following a cruise, we had an Executive room and throughly enjoyed our stay. The access to the 15th Floor lounge was a really nice touch and the breakfast in the morning was very good. We really enjoyed being so close to the beach and also having the mall across the street to stroll through at night. We also used the Hop On Hop Off tour buses that stopped right across the street which worked really well as a way to get around and see the sites. On the map it looks far away from the city center but it really was not, yet it escapes the hustle and bustle of the city. We would strongly recommend this as a place to stay in Barcelona and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel and staff”
Reviews.Author: Malcolm001
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Barcelona and would definitely go back to to the Diagonal Zero. The room was very spacious and very clean and modern. The staff (all of whom spoke very good English) were the best we have ever encountered on our travels. They were extremely friendly and organised tickets at very short notice to visit the Formula One Grand Prix. At the end of our stay we were just about to embark on to our cruise ship when I realised that I had left my wallet containing our money and travellers cheques in the hotel room safe. The hotel staff arranged for my wallet to be transferred to the cruise ship by taxi. A special thank you to Fabrizio, Denise, Maria and Esteban.

Reviews.Title: “Owsome hotel..loved my stay”
Reviews.Author: Gauravcs2000
Reviews.Content: We took right decision to see placess in barcelona with tourist bus, we had 2 days. we got a discount on bus ticket from hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, modern, could be closer to the centre of town”
Reviews.Author: adeleh86
Reviews.Content: Diagonal Zero is about a 30min taxi ride from the airport costing up to 38 euros for one trip. To get into the centre, there is a metro stop located one min walk away and it takes about 15mins to get into the centre of town (eg las ramblas) or 30mins to make it to the other side of town (Montjuic)... Diagonal is a very modern and clean hotel, with a nice outdoor bar area with sofas on the ground floor as well as a small bar on the terrace on the top floor. The pool is unheated and cold! We did actually book a double room but were given a twin room. We queried this and the hotel staff offered a double room on the third floor which is a smoking floor and nearer to the road outside, so we decided to stick with the tenth floor where there was no background noise from the traffic. There was only a shower in the room despite the website implying that there would be a bath. There was a microwave in the room but no kettle. I presume you are supposed to boil your water in the microwave using a cup or bowl... Handy tip, we decided to buy our breakfast from the supermarket across the road where they sell loads of different croissants, cereals, fruit, milk, yoghurts etc. All that you would expect from a large supermarket. The hotel is well situated in this sense. Overall this is an up to date clean hotel with most of the amenities you would expect, however the location could be better as after a long day of walking around, it would've been handy to have only a short metro ride back in order to have a rest before getting changed to go out in the evening.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: znn786
Reviews.Content: First class hotel; helpfull staff; english speaking..close to Metro so going downtown and to the city was very easy.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sargam1
Reviews.Content: Good value for money ideal location and staff. Very friendly atmosphere and very kind behavior.

Reviews.Title: “Great, we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Ingsky__
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, nice rooftop with small pool, super nice & comfy rooms, with even a hdmi & usb connection! Loved the shower. And free wireless internet & parking. Breakfast was a bit busy and at some point there where to much people to handle, but it well with a little patience it was fine. The restaurant is also amazing, nice 3 course menu's for 22 EUR, fresh and healthy. We also went to the spa, 2 for 1 price and had a relaxed afternoon in the sauna & hydromassage bad. Metro 4 is around the corner and brings you in 10 min to the heart of BCN. After visiting BCN for 6 times, we liked to stay at the forum area, because it's not so noisy as in the inner city. And with bad weather you can cross the street and do some serious shopping at the diagonal mar mall. Overall a great experience with super friendly staff and for us a great location, just a cross the sea.

Reviews.Title: “Nice value for a 4 start”
Reviews.Author: blitzman
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very elegant for a 4 star business hotel. The staff is very competent and efficient.

Reviews.Title: “Tried to be modern but should be more practial”
Reviews.Author: meetjoeblack
Reviews.Content: The hotel is on the end of the city center. It takes 15-20min by taxi to the center. The hotel is very new, comfortable in general but there are problems. The rooms that are sold as executive with a different price has nothing more than standard rooms. Same space, same design. They just have an access to roof floor that nobody is working. You can get a free beer from the refrigerator yourself and watch the nearby buildings, not the best scene. So don't pay for executive, its totally meaningless. The wireless connection was weak in some floors. the breakfast was over the standards. The spa also doesnt offer much.

Reviews.Title: “Plain lined hotel, cozy”
Reviews.Author: amerioanna
Reviews.Content: The room was modern in interior, comfortable. What we didnt like is the window connecting it with the bathroom which we found useless but also undesirable. We liked a lot the breakfast room and the patio outside for coffee. Stuff was a little bit slow in service especially in reception when we arrived.

Reviews.Title: “we were treated like kings and queens!”
Reviews.Author: Hugo89
Reviews.Content: together with my sister and spouse, we went to Barcolona to celebrate our 25th wedding-anniversary. we just had a perfect stay! got chambered in the suites! very gentle people at the desk! a real recommendation! near the metro-station. nice and good breakfast! we will not wait another 25 years to go there...........;

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, modern, and excellent service”
Reviews.Author: sophiesaffron
Reviews.Content: Wonderful hotel just a short metro ride away from Barcelona attractions, with gorgeous rooftop pool. Excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: “good location, service and breakfast, but the bed was very low”
Reviews.Author: irityo
Reviews.Content: very close to the metro, buses and the Beach. Grate view from 15th floor – the lounge. Lack of products in the bathroom like Shower cup etc'. there was a coffee and tea kit in the room but not pitcher. On the lounge there were lots of good drinks for free, but not so much to eat. Very nice breakfast. Again, the bed was very strange, very low, soft with hard pillows. Be notice that the check in is only 15:00 which is later then other hotels, and the cleaning of the room been done very late (our room got cleaned one day only at 17:00). Overall it was good staying and I think we'll come back

Reviews.Title: “Memorable Visit”
Reviews.Author: vinams
Reviews.Content: Hotel Diagonal Zero was an excellent choice and Value for Money. DZ stands for its 4 star rating with respect to High Standards maintained which generally lacks in Euro Hotels lesser then 5 stars. Location was Superb, well connected and perfect for outsiders like us. My Toddler ' son' was very fond of the Hotel and the large Room and especially the Terrace Pool. House Keeping staff was very humble and kind. Overall it was very pleasant stay although very short, of 3 nights. Looking forward to visit barcelona next year and continue with DZ.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel modern spacious and immaculately clean.staff were very friendly and helpful.”
Reviews.Author: Peaches51
Reviews.Content: On a recent trip to Barcelona my husband and I stayed in the Diagonal Zero Hotel.We absolutely loved this hotel.It is ultra modern with bright airy spacious bedrooms and excellent power showers.The room was immaculate and I loved the atmospheric lighting once I had figured out the touch screen.We were offfered buffet breakfast at a reduced rate of 8euro which had an excellent choice.While the hotel is about 2Ominutes car drive from the city centre it is not a problem as there is a great public transport transport system with tram just across the road and metro around the corner.Furthermore it was very pleasant to get away from the hussle and bussle of the city centre.I found the staff to be extremely attentive and courteous.Reception staff had very good English and were very helpful with advice on restaurants and trips.I would definitely return to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Poor value for money”
Reviews.Author: sabb_dav
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel during Easter Break. The room where we stayed was too small for two people. Although we always turned the AC to lowest temperature, but the room was too hot. The front desk staff did not bother to help or listen to our complaints about the room. Furthermore, selling the access to the SPA as an extra facility was misleading, as I found we could have accessed the SPA on a pay-as-you-use basis instead of paying for the whole duration of the stay whether we use the SPA or not. Overall, although the hotel is new, but it is overpriced for its quality and for the services. I go to Barcelona quite often but I know I will never stay in this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, good value for money and really nice staff”
Reviews.Author: maisacs
Reviews.Content: Rooms are very modern, clean and comfortable. Hotel restaurant is very high quality and the food is excellent and well presented. Staff are very helpful and nice would definitely recommend. The hotel is a bit far out from the town center but has the tube and tram next to it which will take you to the center of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “A marvelous Hotel”
Reviews.Author: solo9201
Reviews.Content: Have to say for the money it's excellent value,and the location is almost perfect with Metro on the door step,or a nice beachside stroll into town,which used to take an hour on average.I shall certainly be staying again next time.

Reviews.Title: “fantastic!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: clackers20
Reviews.Content: From start to finish a fantastic experience,recommend booking the executive rooms,the servlce was attentive,nothing was to much trouble,the room was spotless.Will we be going back,OH YES!!!!!! A big thank you to the management and staff

Reviews.Title: “Best room I have ever had!”
Reviews.Author: DavidPires
Reviews.Content: The room is quite good because it has a fully functional desk, with internet access by cable. The internet connection is a bit slow however and there is this "Do not disturb" switch in the room entrance which you must pay attention to. Otherwise your room won't be clean. I have learnt this the hardest way... :-) It is also a bit far away from city centre. Any taxi to centre will cost you about 10 euros.

Reviews.Title: “Quality find”
Reviews.Author: canmex23
Reviews.Content: Stumbled upon the hotel looking for a convenient location and was very pleased we did. On arrival we were treated very well and even upgraded to a suite. The rooms were in very good condition, our room had a computer in it with free internet access and very nice ammenities. The location is very close to the metro (1 block) and the Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre for shopping/food. It is also very close to the beach and the convention centre for other type of travel. I would definitely stay there again, good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel, superb staff”
Reviews.Author: tipp21
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for four nights. Could not fault anything, we found the staff to be extremely helpful and friendly. The room was great, spotless clean and the bed was one of the best I have ever slept in!..had a nice mini bar as well....free internet area on the first floor which was very handy....the location is abit out of the main area's but we did not find this a problem as there is a metro station just 3 to 5min walk from the hotel " El Maresme Forum" on the yellow line. There is a large shopping centre just across the road with many bars and restaurants which is very handy. Would stay here again if in Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with great staff and decent food.”
Reviews.Author: aamerzahid
Reviews.Content: Hotel is reasonably priced ....and we got an upgrade. Rooms are very modern and spacious. Bathrooms are simply glorious.....We even had dinner one nite and were shocked to see that the food was of a very high standard and very reasonable. Service is impeccable . Pity that not more people took advantage of the restaurant... But the real difference was the staff. I have been to hotels all over the World and usually of high standards...and I found that the staff here stands out with the very best out there. Location is a little out of the main city but metro and tram are just around the corner...taxis are very cheap in Barcelona . They have a business center which is free and open 24 hrs and all rooms offer wireless .....what more can one ask for !!!!! I highly recommend this hotel hoping that we can still get their great rates for rooms going forward.

Reviews.Title: “Good but could be brilliant if ...”
Reviews.Author: kevinbelliott
Reviews.Content: Myself and two lads got a well priced triple room with breakfast included. Look for the deals. Only 2 years old, and feels clean and modern, with temp and lighting you can fine tune on a digital panel. Staff great. Metro and trams very close for a quick trip into the centre. Here's the downside. The web-site promises more than it gives. The roof-top pool on the 17th floor is not heated, and only open in daylight hours - so not great for February. The Spa is really nice, but what they don't tell you is that you can only use it once, after that you are charged 15Euros each and under 12s not ommitted. If they didn't charge for the Spa, I would definitely recommend it, and want to go back for myself. Its a great shame because this good hotel could be great, by just ironing out these silly things. Reception staff were great though - thanks guys.

Reviews.Title: “would come back!!!100% recommended”
Reviews.Author: sandraGre
